structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases

law.catch_line: Death Of One Of Several Conusors Or Conusees
law.text: If one or more of several conusees or conusors dies before the debt is fully satisfied, the rights and obligations of the survivors and the proceedings for the recovery of the debt shall be substantially the same as in the case of the death of one or more joint judgment creditors or debtors.
